unit_rules.name: Feeder Tendrils
unit_rules.text: Whenever this model destroys an enemy +Character+, gain 1 CP.

unit_rules.name: Neural Disruption
unit_rules.text: Upon Activation, select one enemy unit within 12". That unit must take a Battle-Shock test.

unit_rules.name: Psychological Sabotage
unit_rules.text: Enemy units within 12" have -1 to their Hit rolls. Additionally, attacks against those enemy units have +1 to their Wound rolls.
